item.title: Why ‘buy the dip’ is not that great a strategy, quant firm discovers
item.description: Researchers at AQR tested out buy-the-dip as an investing strategy and were not impressed.

item.title: Even Paramount now thinks Netflix is winning the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery

item.title: ‘I don’t have money to pay for a death certificate’: My sister refuses to probate my father’s estate. What can I do?
item.description: “I recently received paperwork from a company that my father had invested in.”

item.title: A Wall Street legend has passed, but his ’10 surprise’ framework lives on. Manufacturing may be primed for a boom, this firm says.
item.description: U.K. research firm Variant Perception expects manufacturing outside of AI to pick up.

item.title: ‘I am increasingly resentful’: My husband of 10 years has $1 million and cars worth $200K Why won’t he give me money?
item.description: “I maintain the household, walk the dogs and cook regular meals for us both.”
